attributes.action: When people say they have applied for a job on JSA actually check if they have!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everybody on JSA should be actively seeking work but many just say " I applied for a job online" they don't even have a CV. The DHSS staff never check if the client has actually applied for a job and should. They DHSS should check if everyone has a CV and make contact with companies clients say they have contacted to check.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
